meanings: (회의를) call, convene, (formal) summon, (formal) convoke, (군대 등을) (Am) draft, (Brit) call up

vlive.korean: 또 한 명 더 왔다 - 뭐야 다 소집... Here comes another one. - What is this? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 홉온더호텔🥩🍝알고보니 탄이들 집합소로 알려져.. (J-HOPE on the hotel with 3 of BTS members)
vlive.english: Here comes another one. - What is this?

vlive.korean: [그날 밤 크루들을 긴급 소집한 목샘] 저희들을 오라고 하신 이유가... The reason that you told us to come... 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 9부_ep.1 아침을 깨우는 모닝엔젤의 정체?! (ft.벌칙)
vlive.english: The reason that you told us to come...

vlive.korean: [노래방 다녀온 크루들을 급히 소집한 목쌤] 근데 저희를 여기에 오라고 하신 이유가 있나요? [Was called by the teacher after the karaoke room] Why did you call us here? 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 8부_ep.5 ※입덕영상※ 놀 줄 아는 남자들의 노래방
vlive.english: [Was called by the teacher after the karaoke room] Why did you call us here?

vlive.korean: [7인의 멤버 소집 완료] 뭘 해야 되지? [All 7 are here] What do we do? 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [2화] 첫만남에 이렇게 통해도 될일? 어쩐지 짠내나는 아드공 공감토크
vlive.english: [All 7 are here] What do we do?

vlive.korean: 소 잃었는데 소집을 고친다. "To lock the stable door after the horse is stolen." 듣기 View video GOT7 : 다시 돌아온 갓세븐!!!!
vlive.english: "To lock the stable door after the horse is stolen."

examples.korean: to call a meeting/an election/a strike 듣기 Add to Wordbook 회의를 소집하다/선거를 발표하다/파업을 선언하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to call a meeting/an election/a strike Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A Board of Inquiry was convened immediately after the accident. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사고 직후 조사 위원회가 소집되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A Board of Inquiry was convened immediately after the accident. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If you want to call a meeting or anything, just let me know. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 회의라든가 뭐 그런 것을 소집하고 싶으시면 제게 알려만 주세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If you want to call a meeting or anything, just let me know. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A meeting was called for the purpose of appointing a new treasurer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새 총무[회계 담당자]를 임명하기 위한 회의가 소집되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A meeting was called for the purpose of appointing a new treasurer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: to muster an army 듣기 Add to Wordbook 군대를 소집하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to muster an army Add to Wordbook
